title: CSEET January 2026: ICSI Announces One More Opportunity on January 12, 2026!
content:
# CSEET January 2026: ICSI Announces One More Opportunity on January 12, 2026!

Hello everyone! Ek important update hai. The Institute of Company Secretaries of India (ICSI) ne Company Secretary Executive Entrance Test (CSEET) ke January 2026 Session ke liye ek aur opportunity announce ki hai.

Jo candidates CSEET January 2026 session mein appear kar rahe hain, unke liye ICSI ne ek additional chance provide kiya hai.

*   **Original CSEET Exam Date:** January 10, 2026.
*   **One More Opportunity Date:** January 12, 2026.
*   **Time:** The additional opportunity will be held at 02:00 PM (2:00 PM) on January 12, 2026.
*   **Details:** This opportunity is for CSEET candidates appearing in the January 2026 session.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.icsi.edu/)

*Published on: 11 January 2026*
